name: Tata Nexon
description: The price of Tata Nexon, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 8.15  - 15.80 Lakh. It is available in 99 variants, with engine options ranging from 1199 to 1497 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Nexon has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Tata Nexon has a ground clearance of 208 mm  and is available in 15 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.01 to 24.08 kmpl for Nexon.
